Western Sinnoh.requires: |Bicycle| OR ((|HM06 Rock Smash| AND |Coal Badge|) AND (|Works Key| OR (|HM03 Surf| AND |Fen Badge|))) AND ((|HM02 Fly| AND |Cobble Badge|) OR {YamlDisabled(early_fly)})

Eastern Sinnoh.requires: |Bicycle| OR ((|HM06 Rock Smash| AND |Coal Badge|) AND (|Works Key| OR (|HM03 Surf| AND |Fen Badge|)) AND |SecretPotion| AND (|HM04 Strength| AND |Mine Badge|) AND ((|HM05 Defog| AND |Relic Badge|) OR {YamlDisabled(defog_traversal)}))

Northern Sinnoh.requires: (|HM04 Strength| AND |Mine Badge|) AND ((|HM05 Defog| AND |Relic Badge|) OR {YamlDisabled(defog_traversal)}) AND ((|HM02 Fly| AND |Cobble Badge|) OR {YamlDisabled(northern_sinnoh_fly)})

Upper East Sinnoh.requires: ((|HM06 Rock Smash| AND |Coal Badge|) AND (|Works Key| OR (|HM03 Surf| AND |Fen Badge|) OR |Bicycle|) AND (|HM04 Strength| AND |Mine Badge|)) OR (|Bicycle| AND |SecretPotion| AND ((|HM05 Defog| AND |Relic Badge|) OR {YamlDisabled(defog_traversal)})) OR (|[EVENT] Lake Trio Freed from HQ| AND (|HM04 Strength| AND |Mine Badge|) AND (|HM03 Surf| AND |Fen Badge|) AND (|HM08 Rock Climb| AND |Icicle Badge|))

Far East Sinnoh.requires: |[EVENT] Lake Trio Freed from HQ| AND (|HM04 Strength| AND |Mine Badge|) AND (|HM03 Surf| AND |Fen Badge|) AND (|HM08 Rock Climb| AND |Icicle Badge|)

Sunyshore and Beyond.requires: |[EVENT] Cyrus Beaten At Distortion World| OR {YamlEnabled(open_sunyshore)}

Canalave.requires: |HM03 Surf| AND |Fen Badge| AND ((|HM02 Fly| AND |Cobble Badge|) OR {YamlDisabled(early_fly)})

Victory Road.requires: |HM03 Surf| AND |Fen Badge| AND |HM07 Waterfall| AND |Beacon Badge| AND |HM08 Rock Climb| AND |Icicle Badge| AND |HM04 Strength| AND |Mine Badge| AND |HM06 Rock Smash| AND |Coal Badge|
